dt-option.name: select.idSrc
dt-option.summary: Set the data location of a unique row identifier to retain selection on data reload

type.description: Unique data point parameter in the data source for each row.

dt-option.description:
When a DataTable has its data reloaded, it can be frustrating for end users to have their selection removed, particularly if the table is reloaded periodically to ensure that the shown data is fresh.
This option provides the ability to let Select maintain the selected items when the table's data is reloaded (`dt-init ajax.reload()`) by telling it where a unique identifier for each row can be found in the data source. This is typically a primary key value from a database, or similar oid / uuid.
If the data point is not found in the source data, no error is thrown, but the selection will not be retained over data reload.
